Megatron/Motormaster/Speedbreaker/Wildrider
------------------------------------------
OOC: Yanshosh, you've seen Megatron's fusion cannon in the show right? 
How many shots would you say Megatron gets with it? 

BIC:

Megatron walks up to the open hatch inside of Astroblast, almost 
salivating at the chance to flex his proverbial muscle. He raises his 
right arm, equiped with his legendary weapon of destruction on it, and 
takes aim at the pods racing towards the ark. "Don't tell me what to 
do Astroblast" he spits, as he pulls the trigger. "They are nothing 
but stagnating waste, waiting to be born in the inferno of my fusion 
cannon". After finishing the sentence, a small huming sound builds 
inside of his weapon. Deep in it's pit two atoms begin to be forced 
together by energy process, and then a huge torrent of white energy 
begins to grow, and push outwards and grow, until it forms a large 
white bubble around the end of the cannon, straining to hold the 
enormous effects it creates. Air rips, as finally the storm hits. A 
large wide ark of fusion energy explodes from the cannon, pushing 
Megatron back a bit, as he plants his feet, unleashes a screaming 
blaze of chaotic energy towards two of the pods, it's massive area of 
effect. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Wildrider approaches the pod, and quickly shifts and transforms taking 
aim at it, and about to pull his trigger. Speedbreaker barrels into 
his legs however, sending the grey psychotic robot laughing maniacly 
into a rock. Speedbreaker then transforms, and takes aim himself at 
the pod, and is about to pull the trigger.
